template <typename O, typename B, typename S, typename E>
struct vsip_csl::dispatcher::Evaluator
File: ../../../vsip/core/dispatch.hpp

An Evaluator determines whether an Operation can be performed with a particular backend.

Template parameters:
O:Operation tag
B:Backend tag
S:Signature
E:Enable (SFINAE) check.
Specializations:
